Hello blank fragment Hello, Talha! News and Announcements My Property On special insistence of our dealer's and …valued allotter's, the Management of Topcity-1 has decided to extend the "New Year Construction Incentive Offer" till 30th April,2021. Jan Complaint 453698 Active water Update Details Events 5 Marla Balloting Event View More 24 November 2021 07:03 pm Time: 59 Standard Sign In ID: Good Morning B-01 - Block 7 - Street 2 In Topcity1 My Account Profile Options Logout Create Shared Accounts CNIC Number Email Phone Edit Details Camera Gallery 25 Construction Incentive Offer For Topcity-1 Allottees Is Extended. *Please note that the incentives offered by TopCity-1 are only for Residential and Mini-Commercial in Sector A, B, C ,D & I(partial Possession); and the offer will expire on April 30, 2021.Note: The allotters must have to start construction within 02-months from the date of this offer otherwise, they will have to pay all the waived-off amounts. Site Office AIzaSyBY3c7RFvwzs06juEg0nzIU7PVERTIV3U8 AIzaSyA4z1nMNMtAwP47zWC0Xd7_gt67A3EPCMI Subject Message Tagline Goes Here! Your Message Has Been Sent Successfully Our Team Will Contact You Shortly Development Any person intending to directly deposit any installment/payment in TopCity-1 account is required to follow the below procedure: 
 1: Online payment by mobile application or internet banking 
 2: Cross Banking Instrument. 
 3: Proceed to deposit the amount in TopCity-1 Bank Account 
 Payment Detail Bank BANK OF PUNJAB Branch Name BOP-0283 G-11 MARKAZ, ISLAMABAD Title Of Account DYNAST ASSOCIATES (TOPCITY-1) Account # 6010061488300017 IBAN PK34BPUN6010061488300017 Currency Code PKR 1: Fill the online Form available at TopCity-1 website. Direct link is also copied below: Online Payment Receipt 3: The Form filled by any allot tee will be automatically sent to a dedicated finance email. 
 
 4: Upon clearing of the relevant instrument, finance department will update the relevant account statement and will share the same with: 
 - Record Section for physical file Updation Payment Receipt Token / Advance * Registration-No Registration-No * Plot-Size Type of Plot Rupees Received with thanks from Mr./Mrs./Ms. Plot Transaction ID/Bank Receipt Number * Amount In Words CNIC CNIC * Download Forms Procedure Transfer Following are the important documents required from Seller and Buyer/Purchase to process transfer of commercial and residential plots. Seller and Buyer has to be presented at transfer office to complete this process. Regular Transfer Customer Type 1 : Customer Type 2 : Seller Required Documents Account Statement is the first step for transfer in which the seller has to clear his all outstanding objections and dues before start of regular transfer process of plot. ● Seller Application Form (Available at Head office, Transfer Office & Authorized Dealers). 
 
● Seller Affidavit (Minimum Rs.50 Stamp Paper). 
 
● Previous Stamp Duty Collection (If Applicable). 
 
● Advance Income Tax (236-C– FBR) to be paid by seller, if transfer is within Four years of purchase (Filer: 1% , Non Filer: 2% of FBR or Sale Agreement Value whichever is higher) 
 
● Original Allotment Letter (To be withdrawal) 
 
● Original Computerized CNIC & Signature Verification. 
 
● Seller must be present at transfer office for the completion of transfer process ● Purchaser Application Form (Available at Head office, Transfer Office & Authorized Dealers). 
 
● Latest passport size photograph (2-required). 
 
● Purchaser Undertaking (Minimum Rs.50 Stamp Paper). 
 
● Stamp Duty Collection (1% of DC value or Sales Agreement Value whichever is higher) to be paid by the purchaser in Bank of Punjab- Rawalpindi (PRA). 
 
● Advance Income Tax (236k – FBR) to be paid by purchaser (Filer: 1%, Non Filer: 2% of FBR Prescribed Value or Sale Agreement Value whichever is higher). 
 
● Sale Agreement (Under Section 5cc Rs.1,200/- Stamp Paper) [Format Available at, Transfer Office & Authorized Dealers].
Purchaser Processing Fee Processing fee will be paid by purchaser as prescribed by company policy as per the size and category of the property. Allotment New Allotment Letter After all the aforementioned protocols are followed, the new allottee and/ or customer would be notified via SMS and/or Call to collect their Transfer letter from the Transfer Office of TopCity-1 site office. New Transfer Letter Issuance Procedure of Booking/Sales of New plots 

(Residential & Commercial) TopCity-1 offers residential and commercial plots of different categories and sizes to general public for sale. Following are the important documents which required from purchaser for new sale/booking of plots. There are two type of purchasers which are also mentioned below: Documents Required for individual Sales: ● Valid CNIC Copy of Purchaser and Nominees. 
 
● Passport Size Pictures (2) purchaser. 
 
● Signed and thumb impression on Application form (TopCity-1) by the purchaser. 
 
● Application Form can be obtain from TopCity-1 Offices and from its authorized dealers. 
 
● Submission of Payment receipt, Pay order or Bank Draft or online transaction. Steps to follow ● Request required for booking/purchase of plot on Company’s Letter Head. 
 
● Memorandum of Article required. 
 
● Valid CNIC copy of all members. 
 
● Company Registration Certificate Required. 
 
● Company NTN Required. ● Visit the head office for the selection prior information. 
 
● Fill the form. 
 
● Submit the required documents. Possession Documents Required ● Signed Application 
 
● Undertaking (If required) 
 
● CNIC Copy 
 
● Copy of Allotment Letter. Steps To Follow ● Submit the signed application and required documents to Possession Department Head Office Possession Office will provide Account statement. Please download the possession application form Here or from the Download section. 
 
● Clear all dues. (If Required) 
 
● Clear all extra charges. (If any) 
 
● Receive the possession letter in person or with undertaking in time given by possession officer. Water Connection Sop For Providing Water Supply Connection ● Submission of connection application to the water supply department. 
 
● Supply of water connection accessories to water supply department by the client.(Within a week) 
 
● Providing of connection after receiving all the accessories.(2 Days) Water supply connection is free of cost. 
 
● Please download the water connection form Here or form 
 
● Download section.
Q1. How to see Property Details?
Q2. How to see Property Payment details?
Q3. How to create Shared User (Family Members or Tenants)?
Q4. How to create the complaint?
Q5. How to check complaint status?
Q6. How to remove Shared user(Family members or Tenants)?
Q7. How to update my profile?
Q8. How to see the Notifications?
Q9. If you Forgot Password?
Step 1: Signup on TopCity-1 Mobile App. 
 
 Step 2: Click on “My Properties” of the home.
Step 1: Signup on TopCity-1 Mobile App. 
 
 Step 2: Click on “My Properties” of the home. 
 
 Step 3: Scroll down the screen, you will see the payment details in a detailed view and also in a smart view.
We have three methods for adding the shared user to the property. 
 
 Method 1: 
 
 Step 1: Signup on TopCity-1 Mobile App. 
 
 Step 2: Click on the User icon then click on Create Shared Account button. 
 
 Step 3: Click on Add a New User button. 
 
 Step 4: Select your property. 
 
 Step 5: Enter new user details. 
 
 Step 6: Click Share Now. 
 

Method 2: 
 
 Step 1: Signup on TopCity-1 Mobile App. 
 
 Step 2: Click on Accounts in the bottom navbar. 
 
 Step 3: Click on Add a new User. 
 
 Step 4: Select your property. 
 
 Step 5: Enter new user details. 
 
 Step 6: Click Share Now.
Step 1: Signup on TopCity-1 Mobile App. 
 
 Step 2: Click on Service Desk in the bottom navbar. 
 
 Step 3: Click on Complaint. 
 
 Step 4: Choose the category under which your complaint falls. 
 
 Step 5: Select your property. 
 
 Step 6: Tell us your problem. 
 
 Step 7: Click Submit. 
 

Step 1: Signup on TopCity-1 Mobile App. 
 
 Step 2: Scroll down the screen of the home. 
 
 Step 3: Click on the complaint. 
 

We have two methods for removing the shared user from the property. 
 
 Method 1: 
 
 Step 1: Click on “My Properties” of the home. 
 
 Step 2: Scroll down the screen. 
 
 Step 3: Click on View Details button. 
 
 Step 4: : Click on the shared user which you want to remove from your property. 
 
 Step 5: Scroll down the screen. 
 
 Step 6: Click Remove this user. 
 
 Method 2: /n Step 1: Click on Accounts in the bottom navbar. 
 
 Step 2: Click on the shared user which you want to remove from your property. 
 
 Step 3: Scroll down the screen.
 
 Step 4: Click Remove this user. 
 
 Note: If you are Property Owner, then you can remove the shared user(Family members or tenants) other than you will not be able to remove the shared user or Add the shared user to the property.
Step 1: Signup on TopCity-1 Mobile App. 
 
 Step 2: Click on the user icon. 
 
 Step 3: Click on Edit details button. 
 
 Step 4: Click Update.
Step 1: Signup on TopCity-1 Mobile App. 
 
 Step 2: Click on the notification bell icon. 
 
 Note: You will see the notifications in the list.
Step 1: Click on Forget Password on the login screen. 
 
 Step 2: Enter your phone number or Email. 
 
 Step 3: Click on Get OTP. 
 
 Step 4: Click Verify. 
 
 Step 5: Enter new password and confirm password. 
 
 Step 6: Click Update.
